data.message: i have a question facebook i looked in your q&a section but it doesnt answer it for me and i dont know where to go or who to ask about it

replies.message: Let us know your question, Christopher, and we'll see what we can do to help! -Ryan

yes sir i appreciate it.  I get a game app on the face book like to play the games but when i play the game there is a side bar that advertises games and other things but it cuts off half of the screen so i cant play the game and i cant find a way to minimize it or ex out of it to play said game

Hey Christopher. Apps and games are managed by developers outside of Facebook. If you need help with an app or game, please contact the developer directly. You can learn how at: http://on.fb.me/1c3ta8q  -Ryan
its not the game though the works fine i just cant play it cause there is a side bar that cuts the screen off i just need to make the side bar go away and i believe the bar is from facebook itself

Thanks for clarifying, Christopher. Can you report this and include a screenshot? To report it, click the gear icon in the top-right corner, click Report a Problem and follow the on-screen instructions. Thanks! -Ryan
yes i can but i dont know how to create a screen shot
i pressed it and nothing happened
thank you i figured it out
Use your zoom it should only be set to 100% or less
i just didnt know you had to paste it i thought it would tell me that it was saved but it didnt

you respond to his facebook app question, I have been reported to facebook for nude and porn pictures that were not nude or pornographic in anyway over 300 times by a stalker.. I ask you many times about it and you do not respond.. do you encourage people to harrass in this manner, reporting fully clothed photos as porn? Please look at my last photo I was banned for, men military men with thier shirts off and shorts on waiting for something.. not porn not nude or even suggestive, yet banned for 30 days.. I do not understand
